snippet.title: EvoBot - Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Discover the world of EvoBots!

EvoBots is an upcoming mobile adventure inspired by classic games of the monster-taming genre. As part of the Ground Expedition Team you will collect a wide variety of mechanical creatures and use them in turn-based battles. To become a real EvoBot expert you have to master the puzzle elements of the five different energy types to gain the decisive advantage in combat. Can you unravel the dark mysteries of the world of EvoBots?

Find out more about the game on:
https://www.itchyeye.studio/

Follow EvoBots 
X: https://x.com/itchyeyegames/
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/playevobots/

Music by 
https://www.instagram.com/juliane_kb/
https://www.youtube.com/@hauptmannfloete1106

Editing by
https://www.instagram.com/yiko.foto/
